mapper.select: SELECT gu.GU_NAME,s.S_BANK,s.S_ACC,s.S_GCOST,s.S_REGDATE FROM GUIDE gu,SALARY s WHERE gu.GU_SEQ=s.GU_SEQ AND gu.GU_SEQ=#{gu_seq} AND S_FLAG=0
SELECT gu.GU_NAME,s.S_BANK,s.S_ACC,s.S_GCOST,s.S_AREGDATE FROM GUIDE gu,SALARY s WHERE gu.GU_SEQ=s.GU_SEQ AND gu.GU_SEQ=#{gu_seq} AND S_FLAG=1
SELECT gu.GU_SEQ, gu.GU_NAME, s.S_BANK,s.S_ACC,s.S_GCOST,s.S_REGDATE,s.S_SEQ FROM GUIDE gu,SALARY s WHERE gu.GU_SEQ=s.GU_SEQ AND s.S_FLAG=0
mapper.update: UPDATE SALARY SET S_FLAG=1, S_AREGDATE=SYSDATE WHERE S_SEQ=#{s_seq}
mapper.select: SELECT SUM(S_COST) as getsal FROM SALARY s,GUIDE gu WHERE gu.GU_SEQ=#{gu_seq} AND gu.GU_SEQ=s.GU_SEQ AND s.S_FLAG=1
SELECT SUM(S_GCOST) as getgsal FROM SALARY s,GUIDE gu WHERE gu.GU_SEQ=#{gu_seq} AND gu.GU_SEQ=s.GU_SEQ AND s.S_FLAG=1
